description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Joris Kuipers - Manager Technology Delivery at Trifork Amsterdam

ABSTRACT
In this talk Joris will introduce the Spring Cloud project by showing how it provides common abstractions for centralized configuration, service discovery, synchronous and asynchronous service invocations, and other topics that become relevant when building distributed [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Advanced%20Spring%20Cloud
